bill.summary: 11/22/1993--Introduced. Amends the District of Columbia code to make the Mayor of the District of Columbia the Commander-in-Chief of the militia of the District (National Guard) with jurisdiction over: (1) the reserve corps; (2) the appointment of commissioned officers; (3) the call for duty; and (4) general courts-martial.
